headline: Jim Cramer Says He is “Never Going to Say a Bad Word About ServiceNow (NOW)”
summary: We recently published a list of 15 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. When a caller inquired about ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW), Cramer remarked: “Oh, oh yeah…. I bought it for the club. I […]
